name: Round 2: POOL SAFETY PSA
description:
The Game takes a little second to load, please be patient. 

If you are clicking and nothing is happening it's probably a scripted wait moment, do not worry, it will not explode :D 

--

LITTLE EYE DOING THE JUMPY BLINK ANIMATION DURING THE TEXT BOXES WAS MADE BY OUR FRIEND AZZI <3 

NON OF THE MUSIC BELONGS TO US AAAAAA
